title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When selecting line 22, 5 joinpoints are displayed (should only be 3). When selecting line 68, no joinpoints are displayed (should be 2 here). Right-clicking on the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' shows all 5 joinpoints.
SR: Steps to reproduce the bug: 1. Open the attached project and perform a clean compile. 2. Open the cross reference view. 3. Select line 22 and observe that 5 joinpoints are displayed (should only be 3). 4. Select line 68 and observe that no joinpoints are displayed (should be 2 here). 5. Right-click on the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises' to see all 5 joinpoints. 6. Right-click on the marker at line 22 and choose 'advises' to see all 5 joinpoints.
